rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 710px; height: 1px; padding-top: 50px; margin-left: 35px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
